world.location: The ruins of the High Spire - Valley Floor
recent_facts: Kaelen escaped the High Spire as it collapsed into violet smoke and light.
The physical pewter filament in Kaelen's radius bone is severely strained but intact.
Kaelen has secured the Star-Maps and the physical star-shard in his satchel.
The High Spire is completely destroyed, leaving only a hollow in the world.
Kaelen is now a fugitive, alone and injured at the edge of the impact zone.

last_scene: Kaelen navigated the catastrophic collapse of the High Spire, narrowly escaping the Inner Sanctum as it was unmade.
He used the star-shard's resonance to blast through the battlements and jumped into the void as the tower folded in on itself.
Kaelen survived the fall and landed in the valley ruins, now a fugitive carrying the Order's last maps and a dangerous relic.
story_so_far: Kaelen suffers severe starwrought scarring on his right arm from the magical discharge.
The Star-Maps are secured in Kaelen's satchel.
Kaelen begins a desperate escape toward the battlements as the Spire falls.

Kaelen secured the Star-Maps and the physical star-shard before the Spire's destruction.
Kaelen used shard-resonance to disintegrate a jammed door on the battlements.

Kaelen accepted his new role as a fugitive and began his journey away from the ruins.
